website_summaries.verdict: Perfect fit for those who are plugged in 24-7.
pros: Designed for durability and consistent sound, these earbuds are appreciated by  those who need to be dialed in to music and other media at all times and with a reliable listening resource
The design is minimal as well, blending in to your desired look
cons: Feedback occurs with some smartphones and devices

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These have to be the best earbuds I've used yet. I'm very picky about how they fit and sound and the large rubber seals provide the best noise isolation I've had in a long while. The audio is crisp and clear and the bass is just right. Highly recommended to anyone looking for good quality budget earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: John Alder

customer_reviews.title: Product no good; Customer Service great.
customer_reviews.text: I go through earbuds at about a pair a month. I'm super rough on them, wear them almost all day long, and occasionally forget to take them out of a shirt pocket when I do laundry. But these ones are bad right out of the box. Crackling noises through the headphones from the very first use, and I know for a fact it's not a result of my playback device (smartphone) because I have three other sets of headphones that sound great on the same device. EDIT: The seller's response to this issue was incredible, great customer service! Absolutely makes up for being stuck on a train with faulty headphones this morning.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.

customer_reviews.title: Static Noise
customer_reviews.text: Such a shame. These earbuds were packaged so nicely and feels pretty nice. But as soon as I plugged it into my phone and play some music, there would be static noises with the tiniest touch to the base part of the earbuds (the part where it is connected to my phone). Clean the jack and my phone, problem still persists.
customer_reviews.author: Honson

customer_reviews.title: Look for something sturdier
customer_reviews.text: I won't comment on sound quality because I only use earbuds for audiobooks. These seemed to be fine for a few day but very soon the on/off switch quit working. That is a very important feature for me but I continued using the earbuds even though I had to unplug them every time someone wanted to speak to me. They were less expensive than what I ultimately bought but they aren't worth the aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Mouse Art

customer_reviews.title: AT LAST
customer_reviews.text: Finally, earbuds that comfortably fit. I must have small ear holes because every other type I've tried have been either too big or just plain uncomfortable. The GGMM Headphones are great!!!! Sound is fantastic and as I said the small pads make them very easy to fall asleep with. 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A real bang for the buck indeed A+++
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for a friend that didn't have a lot of money.Personaly I pay a lot more because I'm very picky about my buds and I want the best quality sound possible.I was shocked at how awesome these sound.I would say there as good if not better than skull candy inked and for the price you cant go wrong .nicely packaged ,fast shipping and no static that is mentioned in some reviews.Im going to order another pair incase my Sony with extra bass ear buds get broke or stop working.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Solo

customer_reviews.title: Volume and sound quality constantly changing anytime you bump cord or even if you don't
customer_reviews.text: Update: after posting the below review, the vendor contacted me and offered to refund the price I paid and allowed me to try a higher quality product with a 99% off code. Greatly appreciate the customer service! The sound quality and volume adjust if you bump this cord at all. This was exactly why I purchased new earbuds and also these have been in their handy dandy carrying case since I bought them. It's happened since I received them though. I looked to return them but was 2 days past the date. So, I'm stuck with another paid of earbuds that don't work well.
customer_reviews.author: ~April

customer_reviews.title: Loose connection?
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality was really pretty good, however, from the first time I plugged the earbuds in, there was clearly a loose connection somewhere. I tried them on another player just to make sure the earbuds were the problem, and they were. If I jiggle them just right, they work just fine until I move the wrong way and disturb the setting. I have yet to figure out whether the issue is with the jack or the earbud, but that seems a moot point. Either way I was disappointed that they didn't work right from the get go.
customer_reviews.author: Scrapper585

customer_reviews.title: Very poor
customer_reviews.text: They look decent and sound somewhat decent, The problem is.........static. I move around a lot doing my job and the static off these is wicked, seems that the connection is loose for anything that i plug these into. As for other reviewers saying, Make the pin wet to complete the circuit. NO.These are simply poor. You can find better at around the same price range. These things should be pulled from the shelf as they,re junk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: These earphones certainly are cheap for a reason. I've been using these for about a month now, but the moment I started using them the sound would short out after a few minutes of use. I'd have to wiggle the aux input part multiple times to get it to work again. The sounds that came through was okay, but far less superior from earphone I've had in the past. I was planning to return these because they were so bad but I can't return them anymore because I waited too long. DO NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tiara C

customer_reviews.title: Surviving A Teenager
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones that have survived my teens use for the past few months... This says a lot in my household!!! Cancels noise great and is an all around great pair of earbuds, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble with these when I got them. There was a scratchy noise when I would move the jack a little or bump it. I contacted them and they quickly got back to me and asked me to clean the jack with some alcohol. I did that and it worked. The sound quality seems good. I use these in bed with my tablet. I often fall asleep with them in. I have to say they seem more comfortable then other ones I have used that were more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Mine didn’t last even a few times by adult use.
customer_reviews.text: Seemed fine for some basically disposable earbuds at first. After a few times of use, the sounds goes in & out. It was being plugged into a PS4 controller. Would have to keep moving around the plug in part that goes to the controller to get smooth sound. Then after that movement, it would just cut in & out all together. Threw it away. Yes I know they are cheap earbuds but I have bought cheaper than these that have lasted months longer. Yes, I went & bought the ones I’ve bought before.
customer_reviews.author: Charmaine

customer_reviews.title: It's A Gamble
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of them. One does not work with my computer (ended up using an old extender that came with my Lifeproof phone case). The other one did work with my computer. Both work fine with my telephone. However, the earbuds were too big (even after replacing them with the smaller ones that were included). This causes them to fall out while wearing them. It's a shame because the audio quality is good,
customer_reviews.author: XYZ

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: After using the headset for only 2 weeks, the right side started to intermittently allow sound through. Now the right side doesn't work at all, however the microphone still works, for now. I was hoping it was a quality set, but was quickly shown otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: mbi

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Cheaply priced for a reason.  UPDATE: company reached out to fix issue
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money. I purchased THREE sets at once. All 3 sets had static regardless of what the audio source was that it plugged into. Complete garbage. as an update to this, a week later. The seller reached out to me completely unsolicited, offered me not only a refund, but 3 brand new sets (i had ordered 3 originally). A + for customer support. Maybe the best I've ever seen
customer_reviews.author: pie123

customer_reviews.title: Update from previous review
customer_reviews.text: This is an update to my previous review in which I gave the product 1 start, but now I'm given them a five star for excellent customer service. My first set of headphones with microphone had so much statics and I was really disappointed. I contacted the company, and they promptly did everything they could to resolve the issues. I received the replacement headphones and microphone less than a week. The second set work great, it didn't have as much statics as the first one. After cleaning and moved the wire around several time, the statics seem to disappeared. I'm very satisfied with the product, and especially with the excellent customer service that I received from the company.
customer_reviews.author: L.

customer_reviews.title: Insanely Annoying Crackles!!! Deffective!
customer_reviews.text: It seems nice at first glance, but when I actually use them, they suck! the smallest movement causes intense crackles and it's unbareable to use. The sound goes in and out between earpeices when I walk, and loud crackling and poping occurs. The only way I can use them is if I am sitting completely still and the wire dosn't cause the male end to move. I think I undestand why they were 75% off when I bought them... I really dislike the seller for doing this. I would have never bought them in the 1st place if he would have said they have a problem. I'm pretty ticked about this.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Haizlett

customer_reviews.title: Defective jack but great sound when it works
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this product seems to have a defective jack. The sound doesn't come through to both buds until you fiddle with it. People don't always hear on the phone and connected to my computer, I don't hear on the right without adjusting the jack in the port. When adjusted, the sound is super. Faulty construction. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: SilkWorm

customer_reviews.title: High quality for its price
customer_reviews.text: Overall a really solid metal construction on the bud housing and the rubber cord feels sturdy that it won't snap and break. The ends are reinforced with slight rubber to prevent snapping at the ends. There's no volume control sadly, only a single button for skipping music. A plus or minus depending on the users.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and very reliable!
customer_reviews.text: I like these ear buds alot. I use them on the commuter bus and they have a clear sound and great volume control. I have purchased other pairs and within a few days they start crackling or one of the ear buds stop working. I haven't had any problems with these and K have been using them consistently for a couple weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: dreamer68

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Grear performance for the price Especially like the right angle plug that is likely to outlast ones where the cable connection into the end of the plug tends to get flexed until a wire bresks.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Soper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very durable earphones that have good sound proofing. I've had them get snatched up on door handles and drawers and they're still going strong!! Really well made! Only beef I have with it is the Mic quality is a bit low but it's still usable!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, extra parts, killer deal
customer_reviews.text: Really great product, sound is excellent, fits comfortably and comes with three sets of different sized rubber thinghys for various sized ears. The packaging is a little ridiculous, it's what you'd expect from a two hundred dollar pair of ear buds. I don't understand how they sell these at $12.99 but I'm not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Ratamack

customer_reviews.title: The fit is the thing
customer_reviews.text: Once I realized how these buds were supposed to fit into my ears (for some of us, it might be cognitively dissonant---the buds need to be facing away from you), I found them to be the best fitting I've ever used. I would highly recommend them and I will be buying another set or two.
customer_reviews.author: SlenderHope

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Update: The company had great customer service and fixed the issues I was having. They were very responsive and I would order again from GGMM. What you would expect from a cheap pair of ear buds. I rated these low because the I have been receiving a lot of feedback from the connection. I have never had issues in the past using multiple other earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Wjtwibell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphone for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I just received these headphones but I love them already! I bought them for around the house and they were exactly what I wanted. I used them last night and into the morning. They were comfortable and sounded great. Honestly I was surprised how much I liked them! For a budget headphone I would look no further than these.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pokrandt

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price but be careful
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good, noise cancellation is great but the volume control doesn’t work. Also the earbuds ripped right off from the cord. Almost my beats by dre earbuds I used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Seem Durable
customer_reviews.text: Came with a drawstring bag and extra ear pieces. The smallest ones fit me perfectly. The cord doesn't feel too cheap and the sound quality is good; hopefully these ones last me longer than a year. Over the past few weeks they've been thrown around and folded up in my pocket but haven't been damaged and the cord seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones. Quality is good especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Really good headphones. Quality is impressive, especially for the price. They do a fantastic job at noise cancellation as well. I use these everywhere and am forever impressed by how well they block out noises around me. I use them when I am running loud tools, on airplanes around screaming children and on loud busy streets as I am walking to work. They do a wonderful job. Only "criticism" would be that the aux connector that inserts into the aux jack is an L shape and doesn't fit through the case of my phone. It's not a big deal but something to consider if you are looking to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Static during calls and music
customer_reviews.text: Brush the headphone jack slightly while listening to podcasts or music and it produces static. Tested out the phone call audio quality and my caller said there was a lot of static every time I moved. I returned them and was given a speedy refund.
customer_reviews.author: David P

customer_reviews.title: quality varies - mine were very good.
customer_reviews.text: Had these for about 5 months before one of the earbuds finally gave up, and were used constantly while I was demolishing a house. They were used in hot, moist, and at some point dusty environments and never quite decreased in sound quality - In contrast, apple earphones which are about twice the price would have probably lasted about a month in such conditions. I've read some of the other reviews where some people had them not work straight out of the box, and so I would only have to assume it's a bit of a gamble in terms of what you're getting quality wise. I lucked out, because these were some pretty long-lasting durable earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Munoz

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 Connection is defective
customer_reviews.text: Great sound overall with deep bass and nice high tones; however, the 3.5 connection is defective. It loses contact to the right ear bud intermittently disconnecting the sound. Update: Customer service representative immediately contacted me with possible fix, but no joy. The rep sent a replacement headphones. Kudos to their customer service which warranted a 5 stars. I will update the product once received. Update: Received the replacement earbuds, and no issues whatsoever. Great sound!
customer_reviews.author: Quintino T.

customer_reviews.title: Audio jack is faulty
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically and packaging wise these are very nice. The packaging was very clean design wise and the earbuds themselves were comfortable. Unfortunately when I plug them into my phone and laptop you can hear the static and crackly noises when you try to adjust it and the sound quality is poor. I may have just gotten a faulty pair since based off the other reviews they seem a lot better, but they don't seem to match the quality or any of the claims made. UPDATE 10/21 Excellent customer service immediately responded with suggestions on how to fix the static and also offered to refund or send a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Nice earbuds
customer_reviews.text: These are great sounding earbuds and they're very, very comfortable. The only thing bad about them is the cord seems to twist up more than most. I've been having a time with that. But that is the only reason why I rated this 4 instead of 5. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: no1234

customer_reviews.title: Good quality earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: Very well packaged. Multiple ear bud sizes and styles. Sound is good. Most importantly, my wife likes them, and she is hard to please. We haven’t had them for a long enough prior to make a valid durability review.
customer_reviews.author: AEvangelista

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones but NOT durable!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these headphones as they worked excellent with my HUAWEI MATE SE. The sound quality was superb! It also comes with an extra set of in-ear rubbber molds. The only problem was after one week the right ear gave out so they were no good. Hopefully i will have better luck with my next pair, !
customer_reviews.author: William M.

customer_reviews.title: Premium earphones for affordable price
customer_reviews.text: Premium quality, sound, and materials. It comes with 4 pairs of ear plugs for different sizes. Easy to use, the earpiece is made out of metal and wire is flat so it won’t tangle up. Also, it comes with a small bag for you to carry it around. Most importantly the price is very affordable. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Momo Timo

customer_reviews.title: They still work, even after a trip in the washing machine and dryer
customer_reviews.text: I use these for everyday use, and I use them a LOT. They've held up great, and unlike every single other set of earbuds I've owned they continue to work to their full capacity, usually after a long time one of the earbuds would stop working but they havent given up yet! (I purchased these easily over a year ago) They have even survived a cycle in the washing machine and dryer. 5 stars, would recommend to any and all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: SuEllen

customer_reviews.title: these are great, I bought these bc they were a good ...
customer_reviews.text: these are great, I bought these bc they were a good price and they provided the earbud size options. I have little ears and regular buds don't stay in but bc these have the size option I use the smallest and they work and stay in place. I mainly use to to listen to music or movies on my phone while at work or to talk on the phone while driving. No complaints and the price is good
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Washington

customer_reviews.title: Quality earbuds on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Best earbuds I have ever owned. I have had these for a while now the sound was great. Until recently the side with the microphone is not working as good to the point where I have to remove the other bud to make sure sound is still coming through. The side that is working is still providing quality sound. I love the way it is designed even if it gets tangled in the bottom of my bag I am not afraid that I am going to break or ruin it.
customer_reviews.author: Alphonsine

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, great sound quality and great durability. The GGMM customer support is amazing, they provided me a new pair since the first ones that arrived were damaged on arrival, I highly recommend these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: *Fixed now* Not new or tampered with.
customer_reviews.text: I received 4 items all together in a big box. The box for these headphones had the security sticker ripped and was opened. The sound was ok but when the wire moved the audio cut in and out Edit: they contacted me and repaced my item. They where very nice and friendly the new product arrived and it works perfect and is great for the price. I get that mistakes happen and I would highly recommend this companies products
customer_reviews.author: pedro preciado

customer_reviews.title: It just works!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to listen to things. + flat cable: no round twisties, ribbon-like, flows + black: serious business + one-button remote: one is all you need + button: pause, play, ff, rw, answer calls + built-in mike: so you can talk while you listen - the aesthetics of the earbud housing could be improved OVERALL: A+++
customer_reviews.author: David Liang

customer_reviews.title: Only slightly better than apple knock-offs
customer_reviews.text: I happened to be looking for good headphones with microphone, and found this item on sale, and honestly if I hadn’t gotten iton sale I’d say this item is significantly overpriced. The sound quality is great on the actual buds, but with the catch that plugging it in arbitrarily creates static and pops when it turns in the plug. The microphone I found when testing was only slightly better than the knock-off Apple headphones I was using before, having higher sensitivity and picking up background noise more acutely. The most telling thing I can say after purchasing this item is that I’m still looking for better headphones after receiving them.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crackling connection
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the package these crackle and cut out on two phones I tried them with. Once I wet the plug and fiddle with the connection the sound is good and they are comfortable. They don't tangle up as much as other ear buds I have used.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Not for gaming (PS4)
customer_reviews.text: Works OK, but after hey months of using one side is dead which is the mic side. Are use it for my PlayStation which now it’s pretty much useless
customer_reviews.author: 777hp-Honda

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is ruined due to static/scratchy sound produced by ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is ruined due to static/scratchy sound produced by any movement while wearing. If you are completely still, sound is ok, but movement produces excessive noise. Edit: seller promptly replaced the defective product with a working pair.
customer_reviews.author: CoopDeVille

customer_reviews.title: Quality needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: There is scratchy noise from where the wire connects to the input hack, so whenever the wire gets jiggled from movement there is the scratchy noise. The earbuds are comfortable if used only when sitting up, but lying down with head against a pillow the wood part pressing against my ear actually hurt. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Good for running
customer_reviews.text: Stay in the ears well when running which is why I bought them. In-line volume control is nice for running.
customer_reviews.author: Oldcaywest

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had lots different ear bud headphones over the years but this one is the most comfortable I have ever owned. With all the other ones if you wear a beanie or put in any pressure on the earbud while it is in your ear it hurts your ear but with these ones applied pressure to the ear bud inserted in the ear doesn't cause such discomfort. Sound is good too! <3
customer_reviews.author: Rever Eyewer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for earbuds with a microphone.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these earbuds are convenient and they come in a cool case, and also you get some different sizes for the ear pieces and you get a velvet bag with a string at the top to carry the earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce E. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: It's meh
customer_reviews.text: These are decent but the audio in my right earbud stopped working after a while. There are definitely better ones out there
customer_reviews.author: Amil

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: We go through earbuds like crazy around here. Either they get lost or end up in the washing machine. I love these earbuds! I use them everyday to listen to my audiobooks. It also comes with a pouch! I'm extremely happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Raelene Smith

customer_reviews.title: My new go-to ear buds
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and microphone. Great fit as well. Look just like the picture. I was very surprised with the sound quality. The might be the 20th or so pair of ear buds I’ve ever bought and I am hearing new sounds in songs I’ve listened to for over 20 years. All ear buds die at some point. We’ve all figured that out by now. So far these have stood up. However, WHEN these have run their course, I will buy them again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cordova

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I used to be hesitant to wearing in-ear headphones because they sometimes hurt my ears and make me headache. But this GGMM headphone comes with four different sizes of earbuds and they are very soft so I can wear them comfortably for several hours straight. It has decent sound quality for the price. I use them to listen to classical and it can bring out very subtle details. The noise isolation is great, it really helps me focus in the very noisy environment.
customer_reviews.author: Qi

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: First set did not work so I returned them for a refund. The seller later offered me a replacement free of charge for my burden. Very happy with customer service, and the new earbuds work well.
customer_reviews.author: D Eastham

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Have had these for not even 2 months, and one of the headphones quit working. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: TLH

customer_reviews.title: Nice earbuds, But Don’t Last Long
customer_reviews.text: Earbuds were comfortable to wear & worked nicely, but after about three weeks of use the cord broke & earbuds were unable to be used anymore. I ordered two pairs at the same time for my teenage daughters & cords on both sets split open & broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Landfill
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 1 through a deal. DOA. Requested another through Amazon. Same quality poor quality. At best I receive soft muffled static. I continued to research other's experience to find that my issues are not uncommon. Please do not support this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Staticky Sound and overall inconsistent sound
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened and tried the earbuds, I received a static noise in my ear. Depending on how the jack was oriented in the audio plug on my phone, it changed whether or not it I heard sound in both ears, it was muted in both ears, it only played in one ear, or it didn't act like it was plugged in at all. I thought that it could possibly be a problem with my phone but I encountered the same problem when i plugged it into my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable quality
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome.best sound quality,even compared to beats!the mouse cancellation is unbelievable. You can also use these for gaming on ps4.2 thumbs way up!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Heaven Smith

customer_reviews.title: Finicky
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are really weird, the main problem I found is the sound is really bad. I had to position the earbud into the jack at a specific angle to get sound, and it notably quieter than when I used other earbuds, if I don't position it correctly sometimes I will get no sound or just the background music of a video?
customer_reviews.author: Miok Kong

customer_reviews.title: Very nice earphones
customer_reviews.text: The bass is great and not muddy. It has lasted me a few months now without any hearing loss. I like the little pouch and various earbuds that come with it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money... although they will replace if necessary
customer_reviews.text: They started to short out after two weeks. I don’t even use them that often. They still work, but only if I sit still and don’t jostle the cord. Update: The customer service saw my first review and reached out to replace my broken headphones. So far they are working well. I changed my one star review to three stars due to their customer service. Maybe I was just unlucky with the first pair.
customer_reviews.author: katemc

customer_reviews.title: Love these earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: I use them to reduce sound much of the time. For me, they work much better than ear plugs for that. They also work great with my kindle while listening to music or watching video.
customer_reviews.author: RBC

customer_reviews.title: the mic works great, sound is ok
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they get the job done, the mic works great, sound is ok. They don`t tangle easily. Comes with a bunch of earphone adapters to fit anyone. Will buy again if they break.
customer_reviews.author: DAVEO

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Really like these. Only thing I would change is more of a volume range. I like them to turn down very low at night.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: For the price they're a good value.  But if you want great you'll have to spend more.
customer_reviews.text: If you're one of those people who think excessive bass = good sound (ughh) then these are for you. But if you're after great sound, you will have to spend more. Overall you have to have realistic expectations for a low priced product. For the price they are a good value so I rated them 4. I take off a star because I do hear noise when the plug moves in normal activity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12-year old son. They come with a lot of different sized cushions so that they will fit many different ear sizes. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality sometime goes bad easpecially if you are moving while using other than that it is really durable and good.
customer_reviews.author: Furkan

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent and I'd say just as good as Beats. Had these about three months and I'm starting to have some problems with the right earphone which seems to be getting progressively quieter. No problems to speak of in terms of build quality outside of that. We'll see what happens with the right ear. Not really unexpected given the price. Great headphones all around. No sound leakage, great bass, look great.
customer_reviews.author: Various Ehrlichs

customer_reviews.title: (Updated) Only lastes 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't even been 4 full months and the right earbud has gone out already. (Update) Was contacted by the manufacturer and sent a new pair free of charge Overall I'm happy with the earbuds, good sound for the price
customer_reviews.author: Brett Owens

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. Comfortable and the sound is great. I can watch movies on my phone beside my sleeping husband and not bother him at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not so great as earbuds go. Maybe for the price, but... performance was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Keats

customer_reviews.title: I bought two pairs and had to return both due to a faulty connector
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these head phones. Neither pair worked completely and I had to return them. There was an issue with the part that goes in the headphone jack. I know because I'd move it a bit and there would be static and the sound would come back for a brief moment.
customer_reviews.author: newdayrising

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: These crackled when we first put them in to use them. Returned them right away.
customer_reviews.author: sassygirls22

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones for the price. They block out noise well and stay in your ears. The multiple sized ear pieces help make a comfortable fit. My only complaint is that they stick out a little from your ear, so aesthetically not so pleasing. Otherwise they work great and I would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: S. Graybill

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: This products works excellent with my cellphone....... love them and the quality is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Knorr

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife's iPhone and she's loving them.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse A. Safir

customer_reviews.title: Amazing can't get better then these
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't get better then thses, they work great and sound amazing, these been through hell and back, bought them over a year ago and still going strong
customer_reviews.author: alexander r.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality *issues resolved*
customer_reviews.text: I have to say the sound quality of these headphones is pretty good for the discounted price. However the day it arrived there were issues with the headphones going static and losing sound when putting very minimal pressure on the jack or tangling the wiring. Edit: After cleaning the headphone jack a bit from instruction from customer service, the sound/static issue has been resolved with only now some minimal static when putting heavy pressure. Still, thanks GGMM!
customer_reviews.author: S. Park

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and fits my ears perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These sound great and fit well in my ears. I have narrow ears so finding a pair of earbuds that fit correctly is a struggle. These do the job well. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ruffner

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Garbage, may got a bad set, but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Shew

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Work great with good sound. Thanks for something that does what it is advertised to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: They don't stay in ear.
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst designed earbuds ever. I would like to return them, if possible. No quality of sound can make up for the fact that they don't stay inside the ear and this is after adjusting them in every way imaginable. NOT GOOD.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Desellier

customer_reviews.title: Nice earbuds
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice earbuds, easy set up and connection with my pad, very light, quality is good, battery is strong. Worth money.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These buds are great. The thing I like the best is that they are so secure on my ears and they have a great seal. The only bad thing is the lack of volume control.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto Corea

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Extremely sound canceling and nice and durable. It also comes with a warranty to replace them if they break.
customer_reviews.author: Justen Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: These work well for the price, and I like that they had attachments for the ear bud part so you could find one that fits your ear holes well.
customer_reviews.author: Lollerwaffle

customer_reviews.title: Buds don't stay in my ears
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because the ear buds won't stay in my ears. Haven't had this problem before with other earbuds. Did try to use the other sizes and even my old ear buds, but nothing helped. Also, the jack connection was poor. If i moved it a certain way, the sound would stop in the right ear bud.
customer_reviews.author: claire

customer_reviews.title: Best 13 bucks earphone ever have!
customer_reviews.text: Amazed by the sound quality. Fit my ear perfectly. Cannot beat it with this price.
customer_reviews.author: Jankins

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice headphones, especially at the price point. Sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: When I originally bought these ear buds, one side stopped working after only 1 month. This company immediately reviewed the product finding the problem and replaced the earbuds at no extra cost to me. The new buds work great and I have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Lows aren't so great but the kids and highs are really good.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for price. Have held up for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: maddie

customer_reviews.title: While you're execising ...
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for the cyclist. Great sound for the price! Stays put!
customer_reviews.author: C. Bono

customer_reviews.title: Really happy
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good sound. Plus, they do an excellent job of dampening surrounding noise.
customer_reviews.author: Mc4

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are made well and sound great, I seem to be having an issue registering them at the website, any suggestions or links would be nice. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Geshy

customer_reviews.title: Need to block out the world look no further
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new pair of earbuds for work and I came across these gems. Their definitely worth every penny the sound quality is phenomenal and the bass does it's job. The mic is Crystal clear and the controls eliminate having to actually touch my phone to end a call or switch between songs.
customer_reviews.author: leighton
